modName: Startkit Mod And Enb Configuration Tricks
summary: Adds A Startkit as Items at the Beginning in the Helgen Keep.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5][u]Startkit v.5
-And-
Enb Configuration[/b][/u][/size]


=======

Description:

This adds a complete needs in the first scene of skyrim (in Helgen keep)
 
Well i created this mod because on the first scene i want to be a thief or a Warlord or something else .
 
Then when i loot the Chest(imperial) and the body(Stormcloak)
 i found good items but its like something is missing.

So this mod aim to add items to the beginning like:

 *Potions 
 *2 Spells for Warlords wanna be
 *Swords/axes for Warriors wanna be
 *Heavy and light armors (depending what you choose)
 *Bows for Scouts wanna be
 *Daggers for Thief\'s wanna be
 *Lock picks
 *Gold
 * And more :)

=======
 
Enb Configuration

-> Well some tricks that may remove lags that Happened To me :)
-> Download The \"EnbConfiguration\" for what did i do :)


======

Installation:


Nexus Mod Manager

 *Just download/Activate/Play !

Manually Install
 
 *Drag the \"Startkit.esp\" on skyrim Data Directory

=====
 Enb Configuration(Settings)

* Download manually the open the settings.txt
* i contains what did i done to make my skyrim fast

=====

 Incompability:

 Well something that changes the starting items


====

 Bugs:

 None yet

====

 Credits:

[b][u] Bethesda/Creationkit 
 -And-
 Enb by Boris Vorontsov[/b][/u]
author: UnknownHuman
